name: Cheese and Pepper Quesadillas
description: Delicious served hot with Epicure Poco Picante Salsa and Guacamole.
preparation: Combine first 4 ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Lay tortillas on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner.
Divide mixture between 6 tortillas, spreading slightly to within 1⁄2" of edges.
Top each with another tortilla. Bake for 8 minutes. Cut in wedges and serve.
tips: Can be done a day ahead – simply stack baked rounds and wrap tightly with plastic wrap.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
